subject: Hello, Good day,   My name i
body: Hello, Good day,   My name is TOLEDANO  NETANEL from the ISRAEL GAZA  border . I have tried to reach you but find it difficult due to internet scarcity here in this town. I also have 599kg of 24carat gold and $10million dollars. I want to ship to your country and establish a gold jewelry manufacturing company. I will offer you good monetary rewards for your help, thanking you as I wait to hear from you soon so I can tell you more . this serious this my life i have lost all my family in the bomba attack here in gaza i never nobody i am trying to save my life for this , pls am ready to give you 50percent of it this is serious they bomb my father business my mother business the company they have all been bomb by the hamas and the israeli army, i have nowhere to run to  and i can't lose this great blessing from my late father and family,,,,,, pls why am saving my life i will be glad for your helping  hands in my life , and i will be ready to share it all with you  thanks may god bless your  Thanks from  TOLEDANO  NETANEL  , +972984567095 , i will be waiting and be glad to hear from you

subject: Re:   Hello, Good day,   My name i
body:
Hello TOLEDANO NETANEL,

I'm sorry to hear about the difficult situation you're facing. It's really brave of you to reach out and seek help in such trying times. I'm interested in hearing more about your plans for investment and how I might be able to assist.

You mentioned wanting to set up a new business in my country, could you tell me more about what kind of business you're thinking of? Also, it sounds like you have some experience with gold jewelry companies, is that something you've done before?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Tony

subject: Re: Hello, Good day, My name i
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this heartfelt story about your late father. It sounds like he was a truly remarkable man who had a significant impact on his community and those around him. His teachings about trust and honesty are indeed valuable life lessons.

I'm sorry to hear about the difficult circumstances you're currently facing. It's admirable that you're striving to carry on your father's legacy by using what he left behind to create a better life for yourself and others.

You mentioned something about boxes, funds, and a barrister? Could you please elaborate more on that? I'm not quite sure I understand what role they play in your situation.

Also, it's great that you have such faith in God during these challenging times. Your resilience is inspiring!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Stay safe!

Best wishes,
Tony

body:
